metadata.title: Why Does It Take Time to Turn OFF After I Release My Finger?

sections.content:
Question:
Why does the judgement take some time to go to OFF after I release my finger from the electrode?
Answer:
The number of consecutive match measurements set by the negative noise filter may be large.
OFF is judged after OFF is reached for the number of times set as the number of consecutive coincidence measurements.
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
